Note:
Preceded by prose introduction; and another prose introduction introduces a version of the Creed, 1543; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler TM 852 includes 1543 as part of this text.
Subjects: Christ, Passion of; Passion, meditations on
_description: ‘XV Articuli Passionis Ihesu Christi’ — fifteen 8-line stanzas

BodeMus160.First Lines:
Ihesu for thy preciose bludThou swet on monte of
                    olyuete…
BodeMus160.Last Lines:
…To lef in siche lyf gyf ws graceTo go to blyss with thy
                    saintes all
